content: Following the resignation of [David Marshall](/wiki/David_Marshall_(Singaporean_politician)), [Lim Yew Hock](/wiki/Lim_Yew_Hock) was appointed by the [Governor of Singapore](/wiki/Governor_of_Singapore) to form the next government. One day after his appointment, he announced his cabinet, which closely resembled that of his predecessor, with only minor changes to portfolio allocations.
